catalog_metadata.name: Lamp Stack Deployment
catalog_metadata.description: Deploy a LAMP Stack to one of the cloud providers listed

bullets.title: LAMP Stack
bullets.description: Deploys a LAMP Stack enabled on a vm ready for use

catalog_metadata.author: admin

tags.name: Request_Group
tags.label: Request_Group
tags.description: The current context group id of the current user that requested the provisioning of the template. This is important because a user may be part of more than one group and this identifies the context of which group the user made the request.

tags.name: Request_User
tags.label: Request_User
tags.description: The user id of the current user that requested the provisioning of the template.

tags.name: Service_Name
tags.label: Service_Name
tags.description: Name provided for the service instance by the end user at time of request

tags.name: Service_Identifier
tags.label: Service_Identifier
tags.description: Unique identifer generated by ICAM which is mapped to the service instance of the template provisioned.

tags.name: Dept
tags.label: Department
tags.description: Which department should be charged for this instance

actions.name: Provision
actions.description: Default action for deployment of service

input_parameters.name: user_email
input_parameters.label: Your email address
input_parameters.description: Email address to which you want instance details sent to

input_parameters.name: inst_pwd
input_parameters.label: Instance Passwords
input_parameters.description: password that will be set on each instance and user in the deployment

input_parameters.name: ints_prefix
input_parameters.label: Instance Name Prefix
input_parameters.description: supply the prefix to be applied to your instances name in the cloud
input_parameters.regexdesc: only lower case alpha, numeric, and underscore are allowed

input_parameters.name: inst_prefix
input_parameters.label: Instance Prefix
input_parameters.description: The prefix added to your cloud provider instance names
input_parameters.regexdesc: only lower case alpha, numeric, underscore and period are allowed

input_parameters.name: user_id
input_parameters.label: Admin User Name
input_parameters.description: Admin username setup on the cloud instances
input_parameters.regexdesc: starts with lowercase alpha and contains lowercase alpha or numeric with length of between 6 - 12
